Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class School

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.School
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class School extends Object implements Serializable
School class represents the game's school boards, which contain the students' hall and entry and the player's towers.
See Also:

      towerColor - the player's tower color.
      initialStudentsEntry - the initial students' entry.

    • decreaseTowers

      public void decreaseTowers()
      Method decreaseTowers removes a tower after an island conquer by a player, and fires the changes to the clients.

    • increaseTowers

      public void increaseTowers()
      Method increaseTowers increases the tower count by one after a previously conquered island get conquered by another player, and fires the changes to the clients.

    • getNumTowers

      public int getNumTowers()
      Method getNumTowers returns the number of towers present on the school.

    • swapStudents

      public void swapStudents(Color studentFromEntry, Color studentFromHall)
      Method swapStudents manages the logic of the Minstrel character card, which allows the swap of a student from the hall to the entry and vice versa.
      Parameters:
      studentFromEntry - the color of the student from the entry to the hall.
      studentFromHall - the color of the student from the hall to the entry.
      See Also:
      • MinstrelSwapStudents
